name: Infiniraft
description:
Your oddly large raft is sinking!
Collect your coin bags, quickly.

Goal

Collect coins to win.
The amount needed is indicted in yellow at the bottom-left of the screen.

Stepping on broken planks or in water hurts you, so try not to do that.
Your health is shown in pink at the bottom-left of the screen, increase it by picking up med-kits.

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Enter to pause
  • Z to restart after dying or winning

A Ludum Dare 49 submission.

Licenses

Infiniraft's source code is licensed under GNU AGPL-3.0, and its game assets are licensed under CC-BY-SA-4.0.

See the README.txt file in the licenses folder included with the source code for more details.
